response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations and contribute greatly to your success. Given its immense value, it is worth noting that the product holds an intrinsic worth of $800,000 to us. However, considering its potential impact on your endeavors, we are more than willing to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 750000}
